description.value:
Known to the Mechanicus as Autosanguine. The Dark Mechanicus call it Black Blood. The User is always considered Lightly Wounded, and heals two wounds per day instead of 1.

Requirements

Generally Mechanicus Only although available through illegal Heretek opeartions.

Effect: Very Rare

Notes: -
